observation: I can see a country selection dropdown is open with a long list of countries. I can see many country options from Afghanistan to Zimbabwe. I need to select a suitable country for sign-up. Looking at the list, I can see several good options that are typically allowed on financial/trading platforms like Indonesia, Malaysia, Australia, Germany, Japan, and others. I should select one of these countries to proceed.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I need to select a country to continue the registration process. From the visible list, I'll choose Australia as it's a well-known country that's typically accepted on most platforms and I can see it clearly in the list at element 71.
ux_issues: The country list is very long and could be overwhelming for elderly users
Small text size in dropdown could be difficult to read
No search functionality visible to quickly find countries

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The dropdown menu remains closed with 'Select' placeholder text still showing. No country selection has been made and the interface appears unchanged between before and after screenshots.
dual_diagnosis.diagnosis: The tap action on Australia country option did not register or execute properly. The dropdown either failed to open or the Australia option was not successfully selected.
